1. Duration of Contract The estimated start date of the Employment relationship is: ?DATE_START and the contract is expected to end on: ?DATE_END
2. Place of Work and Working Position The Employee shall be employed as ?POSITION on the ?SHIP (subject to changes).
3. Salary The basic salary (during an assignment to a ship - nur UV) shall be € ?BASIC_SALARY (, and € ?RED_BASIC_SALARY during periods without service - nur UV), the monthly net salary (during an assignment to a ship - nur UV) shall equal € ?NET_SALARY ( and € ?RED_NET_SALARY in periods without service - nur UV) (including payment of compensation for days of rest, contribution to private pension provision and deduction of the insurance contribution).
4. Entitlement to Vacation Days The Employee is entitled to 25 paid vacation days per calendar year.
5. Illness and Injury The Employee renounces voluntarily to be insured by the Employer against illness and injury. The Employee confirms furthermore, that he/she is insured at his/her own cost and risk against illness and injury at his/her own private insurance whose benefits have to be at least equivalent to the benefits of the Employer’s insurance.

We hereby acknowledge your resignation from our employment relationship as of ?DATE_END due to your failure to appear at your work place onboard ?SHIP at the agreed date and time.
OR

The work relationship therefore ends with retroactive effect as per ?DATE_END.
